backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing site ownership, authorization, user profiles, order creation and management, and contact message storage with admin/owner access checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files across pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including OKLCH variables for light/dark themes and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all public and admin routes wrapped in global layout and error boundaries.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that enforces authentication and site ownership, handles login flow, and conditionally renders admin content or guidance.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Bitcoin: Displays Bitcoin payment instructions with copy-to-clipboard buttons for order ID, BTC address, and amount. Provides alerts and styled sections to assist users in completing crypto payments.
frontend/src/components/error/GlobalErro: A React error boundary that captures and logs errors safely and renders a fallback UI. Supports resetting and handles unknown error types gracefully.
frontend/src/components/error/SafeSectio: Wraps UI sections in a lightweight error boundary to prevent isolated failures from breaking the app. Uses a simple fallback that hides failed sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/PromoTick: Displays a horizontally scrolling promotional banner with repeated flash‑sale messages and icons. Enhances visibility of ongoing offers.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, navigation, promo ticker, recent orders menu, and footer. Handles admin link visibility based on user identity and actor readiness.
frontend/src/components/orders/RecentOrd: Shows a dropdown menu listing up to five recent orders with status badges and links. Fetches order history and details, handling loading and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Denom: Renders a grid of denomination cards showing USDT values, discounts, and BTC equivalents, allowing selection of a denomination. Uses live or cached BTC rates to compute amounts.
Displays a callout card highlighting the minimum and maximum supported USDT denominations. Provides a visual summary of available card values.
A dropdown selector for choosing a USDT denomination from supported values. Shows the available range and triggers value changes.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Quant: A numeric quantity selector with increment/decrement buttons and validation between min and max values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBtcUsdtRate.ts: Fetches BTC/USDT price with caching, fallback logic, and periodic refetching using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistory.ts: Loads and syncs persisted order history with error handling and storage event listening.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistoryDetail: Fetches detailed order data for multiple order IDs using parallel React Query requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for orders and contact messages, handling CRUD operations via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables, theming, and ticker animation styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays company overview with sections on identity, offerings, and process using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContactMes: Admin page listing customer contact messages with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin page that displays detailed info for a single order and allows updating its status with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin table view listing all orders with status badges, navigation actions, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Handles denomination and quantity selection, calculates totals, and saves cart data before navigating to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Collects buyer details, validates cart session, creates discounted BTC orders, and shows payment instructions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form that submits messages through a backend mutation with success and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Shows an FAQ accordion covering gift card basics, payment, delivery, discounts, and order tracking.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalErrorFallbackPa: Displays a global error screen with options to reload or return home and shows detailed error info in development mode.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, product highlights, and navigation to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Shows the user's past orders with status badges and handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Displays detailed status and payment information for a specific order, with live BTC‑USDT conversion.
frontend/src/pages/TrackOrderPage.tsx: Provides a form for users to enter an order ID and navigate to its status page.
frontend/src/state/cartSession.ts: SessionStorage-backed utility for saving, loading, and clearing the shopping cart state.
frontend/src/state/orderHistory.ts: LocalStorage-backed order history manager with in-memory fallback, supporting adding, updating, listing, and removing history entries.
frontend/src/utils/denominations.ts: Exports the supported fixed gift-card denomination values.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Helpers for normalizing, formatting, and categorizing errors into user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Maps backend order statuses to simplified labels and badge variants used in the UI.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Utility functions for discount calculation, BTC/USDT conversion, and formatting currency values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear or retrieve them with precedence rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, colors, container settings, and plugin integrations for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and overall state for a Binance-themed gift-card app.
